assignments.name: query
assignments.value: ={{ $json.topic }} ((-filter:replies min_retweets:2 min_faves:30) OR (filter:self_threads min_faves:15)) lang:en -spam -promotional -"follow me" -bot -"dm me" -"link in bio" within_time:24h

tweets.text:
I used this n8n workflow to scrape X for top-performing posts in my niche (it's a big part of how I went from 600 → 6k followers in 13 days)

most creators scroll for hours to find content ideas that work...

whereas I just run this flow and get a full swipe file in minutes - organized by likes, comments, shares and URLs.

here’s what it does:
- drop in a keyword
- scrapes X for top posts
- pulls engagement data + content
- auto-sorts it all into a Google Sheet

now you've got data-backed insights ready to plug into your tweets, ads, or even video scripts.

workflow takes 5 minutes to set up

want the full JSON?

comment “SWIPE”, follow, + repost and I’ll send it over (must be following so I can DM)

profile_bio.description: automating marketing workflows with AI and sharing takeaways

tweets.text:
NEW: our June list for the fastest growing software companies on Ramp @tryramp

Google’s AI product finally tops our list…for its consumer AI plan. Read why in our full writeup below.

Standouts: @DescriptApp @n8n_io @getpostpilot @cartainc https://t.co/0dpN8P21ct

profile_bio.description: Economist at Ramp Economics Lab @tryramp. Writing and analysis of AI, business spend, and the economy at https://t.co/rFk0ZcjkR3. Prev economics lead @square @cashapp

tweets.text:
the creator who's banking $47K monthly from TikTok asked me not to share this automation...

these brain-rot style videos are pulling 10M+ views consistently on TikTok and YouTube Shorts

faceless channels are banking $15K-$50K monthly from this exact format

here's what my n8n workflow does automatically:

- generates viral Peter Griffin & Stewie conversations
- clones their actual voices using AI
- overlays them on Minecraft parkour gameplay
- adds perfectly timed subtitles
- renders complete videos ready to upload

these videos exploit dopamine triggers

the background gameplay keeps viewers glued while the AI-generated dialogue delivers the actual content

it's psychological manipulation at its finest

I spent 40+ hours perfecting this:

- gathering rare audio samples for voice cloning
- training custom AI voice models for both characters
- building the complete automation workflow
- testing render quality and timing

the results speak for themselves

channels using this format are going from 0 to 100K followers in weeks

some are hitting 50M+ monthly views with zero effort after setup

the workflow handles everything:

-content ideation
-script generation
-voice synthesis
- video composition
- final rendering

you literally press one button and get viral-ready content

while everyone's still manually editing videos, smart creators are scaling with automation like this

the opportunity window is MASSIVE right now

these formats are exploding across all platforms

Comment "VIDEO" + repost this + follow me (MUST DO ALL) and I'll send you the complete JSON file plus setup guide

a lot of people will ingore this and last yet another occasion to finally make it

don't sleep on it.

profile_bio.description: professional swe | ai sales automation systems  🪄

tweets.text:
Self-hosting n8n on a VPS leveled up my whole setup 🔥

Here's what I'm automating:
- Ping & monitor my homelab (Zima board, NAS, RPi)
- Trigger local LLM workflows with Open WebUI & LiteLLM
- Auto-parse logs + alert me on port scans or anomalies
- Control remote access policies via VPN APIs
- Publish markdown notes/blogs via GitHub triggers

It’s super simple to set up, gives me full control over my automations and has enough power to handle whatever I throw at it.

If you want to try it out, head over to https://t.co/7X5m6kbAv4 to grab your VPS and use code NETWORKCHUCK for a discount.

profile_bio.description:
Believer. Beard. Coffee. Tech. Youtube.

Check the link in my bio to see my latest video!

tweets.text: The year is 2026. You’ve perfected a n8n automation flow and are seamlessly scraping the trending topics across x, tt, ig. It gets pushed into the llm node you trained on the last 3 years of your writing style. It spits out a “fresh” take in your tone of voice and repurposes it to all your social media channels. The content racks up views and likes, dopamine rush hits and you continue to optimize your ai workflow for max impressions. The impressions however, are made up by your follower’s ai agents who both reply within 3 seconds of posting and are also a node in their own automated ai workflows. They repurpose your content into recaps out to their own existing channels. The cycle of life continues, galaxies expand, regurgitated information grows, the internet seems more alive than ever filled with our ai agents “liking” “replying” and recycling key opinions until the end of time.

profile_bio.description: cmo @hypepartners // ecom, dtc, saas growth background // always growing

tweets.text:
INSANE n8n workflow

Customer feedback comes in, uses Firecrawl to enrich it, emails me to review, sends to an AI agent (Devin) to fix automatically.

It PRs -> notifies me -> then on merge -> replies to customer

Been testing in a few cases and it slaps! https://t.co/2Q5pn2gR5e

profile_bio.description: co-founder @firecrawl_dev 🔥 - yc s22 prev built Mendable (AI docs chat used by Snap, Coinbase, MongoDB)

tweets.text:
n8n Basics - Setup LinkedIn Node

I got multiple DMs asking me how to do this.

Here's how to setup up LinkedIn Node in n8n step by step:
- Create LinkedIn Page
- Create LinkedIn App
- Request required permissions
- Add credentials to n8n
- Verify the process

What do you want next?
I will share another one tomorrow!

profile_bio.description:
✦ Journaling AI insights & automation workflows
✦ Daily Tips and Tricks
✦ Building @hemalytica – AI that visualizes blood reports
